author: gbrown
msg: Eliminate need to call refresh() to perform initial Folder population; allow callers to set a file filter after a Folder has been constructed; other minor improvements.

author: chabotc
msg: First step of template libraries support, calling simple libraries works now, os:render and external libraries still have to be implemented (for a demo try http://test.chabotc.com/template.xml)

author: mikedd
msg: Allow DB2 to use setByteArrayInputStream instead of setBytes when needed.
